definition: to raise a hand/to put up one's hand (as signal)
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
lit. the exertion of lifting one's hand (idiom)/fig. a very slight effort

pinyin: yi1 ju3 shou3 yi1 tou2 zu2

sentences.chinese: 隱士舉手合十在他的額頂。

sentences.english: To reform a man is a tedious and uncertain labour; hanging the sure work of a minute.
sentences.chinese: 改造人是冗長而無把握的工作，絞刑則是舉手之勞。

sentences.english: You and Verana both had your hands up at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 你和維若娜同時舉手的。

sentences.english: Also, Jeroboam son of Nebat rebelled against the king.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門的臣僕，尼八的兒子耶羅波安也舉手攻擊王。

sentences.english: It takes courage to raise your hand and ask for clarification.
sentences.chinese: 它給你舉手澄清問題的勇氣。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a teaching aid for communication between teacher and students: hand-up device.
sentences.chinese: 課堂舉手器，它涉及一種課堂師生交流的教學器具。

sentences.english: Raise you hand. Ah,couldn't trick you.
sentences.chinese: 請舉手，大家沒被這題騙到。

sentences.english: While you are recapturing such an experience, let me raise my hand first.
sentences.chinese: 當你還在回想之際，讓我舉手揚聲吧。

sentences.english: Raise your hand before you speak, please.

sentences.chinese: 他們相互舉手擊掌互致敬意。

sentences.english: He raised his arm up to fend branches from his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他舉手將樹枝從他眼前檔開。

sentences.english: Put up your hands rather than yelling out, put up your hand if you think this argument is sound?
sentences.chinese: 舉手，不要喊出來，如果這個論點是完好的，請舉手？

sentences.english: Put up your hands rather than yelling out, put up your hand if you think this argument is sound?
sentences.chinese: 舉手，不要喊出來，如果這個論點是完好的，請舉手？

sentences.english: Finish the workbook page 3 . If you have any questions , please raise your hand .
sentences.chinese: 完成第三頁的練習，如果有問題，請舉手。

sentences.english: If you have any questions, please raise your hand.
sentences.chinese: 如果你們有任何問題，請舉手。

sentences.english: In 2K11, you could perform the Hands Up move but doing so restricted your movement.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以舉手，但是這樣做限制了你的其它動作。

definition: to stand in a circle and watch
upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
